text:
Company: Lee Group

Role: Stonemason

Company Background:
Lee Group is a leading construction and restoration company specializing in high-quality masonry projects. We pride ourselves on our inclusive culture that values each individual’s unique contributions and believe that our team is stronger because of its diverse members.

Job Type: Full-Time

Job Description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and skilled Stonemason to join our dedicated team. The ideal candidate will have experience in crafting and restoring stone structures, a strong attention to detail, and a commitment to quality craftsmanship.

Responsibilities:
- Perform stone cutting, shaping, and installation.
- Repair and restore existing stone structures.
- Collaborate with project managers and other team members to ensure project success.
- Maintain tools and equipment in good working condition.
- Adhere to safety standards and regulations.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- Proven experience as a stonemason or similar role.
- Ability to read and interpret technical drawings and plans.
- Strong attention to detail and craftsmanship.
- Excellent problem-solving skills.
- Physical stamina and the ability to lift heavy materials.
- Experience in conflict resolution and managing stakeholder relationships is a plus.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary ranging from $45,000 to $65,000 annually, based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health benefits, including medical, dental, and vision coverage.
- Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
- Paid time off, including holidays and vacation days.
- A supportive and inclusive work environment.

Application Process:
Interested candidates should submit their resume and a cover letter highlighting their relevant experience and skills. We look forward to welcoming a new member to our diverse and talented team.
